content: JMD Pools is a leading swimming pool construction and maintenance company providing world-class pool design, development, installation and services across India.
JMD Pools offers premium fiberglass swimming pools which are durable, quick to install, low maintenance and come in modern designs. Ideal for residential and commercial properties.
Concrete swimming pools by JMD Pools are designed to be long-lasting, customizable and structurally strong. Suitable for villas, resorts, hotels and luxury properties.
JMD Pools provides full swimming pool maintenance services including cleaning, repairs, AMC support and crystal-clear water care solutions.
Customers can contact JMD Pools for pricing, brochures, pool designs, consultation and installation support via call, WhatsApp or website enquiry.

JMD Pools pricing depends on size, depth, material (concrete / fiberglass / vinyl), filtration technology, site prep requirements. Typical starting range ₹3 Lakhs to ₹25 Lakhs depending on customization.
Standard pool construction time 20-45 days depending on site conditions, design complexity and approvals.
JMD Pools offers long-term structural warranty along with warranty for filtration equipment. Warranty details vary by pool type.
